channel.title: FM III | Lucid Dreamers | Canned / Dreamers Win
channel.description:
# Forum Mafia III: Lucid Dreamers
##Rules: _Credits to FoL hub._
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. If you haven't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screenshot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 8. Players are not allowed to use big letters or italics. These are reserved for your truly. 9. Have fun!
##Standard Mechanics: The day is 72 hours long, the night is 48 hours long. Day ends once majority vote is reached. For my sake don't twilight post. Nightmares win once their numbers are equal or higher to the Dreamers.
##Special Mechanics:
This game does not have individual abilities for roles. instead, every night every player may submit an action in **Dream Format**. Dream Format differs from normal actions in that it both states the action you are performing AND who it's on. However, you may not ask for specific role abilities. Instead, you try and imply said abilities through your submission. At the end of the night I will inform you what your submission did.
**Examples:**
'I gain a 1-shot Vig shot and use it on Bob' [color=red]**INCORRECT**[/color] 'I find a gun at my doorstep and shoot Bob' [color=green]**LEGAL**[/color]
**Dream Restrictions**
1. Only scum may dream up a SINGLE kill, so there are no TKs and 1 kill per night. 2. I may limit or reject absurdly gamebreaking actions. 3. Every action may target a maximum of 2 people. 4. If your action is vague I can interperet it however I wish at your own risk. 5. There will usually only be one effect per dream 6. Conversion to other alignments is NOT ALLOWED.
[color=green]**Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer** **Dreamer**[/color] [color=red]**Nightmare** **Nightmare** **Nightmare**[/color] [color=grey]**Restless**[/color] Dreamer: > Welcome, [X], you are a [color=green]**Dreamer**[/color] > Your win condition is to eliminate the [color=red]**Nightmares**[/color] and the [color=grey]**Restless**[/color]. > Abilities: > -Each night you may dream, and it just might come true! > -You may not kill anybody with your dreams. > -You may also vote on the lynch every day.
Nightmare:
> Welcome, [X}, you are a [color=red]**Nightmare**[/color] > Your win condition is for the [color=red]**Nightmares**[/color] numbers to be equal or higher than the [color=green]**Dreamers**[/color]. > Abilties: > -Each night you may dream, and it just might come true! > -Your allies are X and X. Keep them alive at all costs. You may communicate at night. > -You may also vote on the lynch every day.
Restless:
> Welcome, [x], you are the [color=grey]**Restless**[/color]. > Your win condition is for the [color=red]**Nightmares**[/color] to win while you are still alive. > Abilities: > -Each night you may dream, and it just might come true! > -You may not kill anybody with your dreams. > -You may also vote on the lynch every day.
## Players: 1. PokemonKidRyan 3. Damafaud 5. JammySplodge 6. Hippolytus 7. FadeBlade 9. PolikShadowbliss 10. Lymphoma 12. [s]simon[/s] [s]Frost[/s] **Open Slot. PM me if interested.**
**Graveyard** *The last vestiges of Ici's originality* 8. Bob - Lynched D1 [color=red ]**Nightmare**[/color] 11. orangeandblack5 - Killed N1 - [color=green]**Dreamer**[/color] 2. SadSnake - Lynched D2 - [color=green]**Dreamer**[/color] 7. FadeBlade - Killed N3 - [color=green]**Dreamer**[/color] 4. Insanity - Lynched D3 - [color=green]**Dreamer**[/color]
## Final Note: This game will likely end up being unholily unbalanced. Be warned.

item.title: FM III | Lucid Dreamers | Canned / Dreamers Win
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Yeah, it’s not like I would’ve helped them by mistake again if this game had gone on.

I chose Dragon first time, making the kill unstoppable. I chose Mole the second time revealing that there’s a dreaming God.

I told you guys I was a God of FM. I hinted about as much as I could do.

Read full topic

item.source: FM III | Lucid Dreamers | Canned / Dreamers Win

item.title: FM III | Lucid Dreamers | Canned / Dreamers Win
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
@Polik Don’t know, hadn’t figured it out yet. Couldn’t have stopped the modkills.
PKR as a Dreaming God could choose between one of these names and this would have an effect on the game:
Dragon - Nightmare kill is unstopable
Snake - No visits will be tracked by anyone. (Everyone has the Ninja modifier)
Sloth - Day is 24 hours longer.
Lion - All players take one vote less to lynch.
Mole - Nightmares are informed there’s a Dreaming God in the game.
Hawk - Everyone’s visits will be announced the following night.
Hydra - Every player is linked to another player randomly. If one dies the other dies as well.
Wolf - Rouge, Snake and Orange secretly decide the lynch for everyone. Nobody can vote, and must convince them to kill who they want. (Tardis was originally on this team, but he had perronal biz. This was the one I wanted you to choose the most, obviously)
Spider - The lynch is delayed by one day. (Poison)
Dove - All players take an extra vote to lynch (PEACE MAN)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
ALLRIGHT EVERYONE. A MAGICAL BOLT COMES FROM THE SKY AND MODKILLS THESE PEOPLE:

Nozbugz has been modkilled! They were a Dreamer

Hippolytus has been modkilled! They were a Nightmare!

Lymphoma has been modkilled! They were the Restless!

FadeBlade was in fact a Nightmare all along, and clearly the game is dying so no point in carrying on, so thus:

Dreamers Win!
